title: April 1 Dev Blog: Exploring the World of Factions

embed.description: As we gear up for the next arc, we've been thinking a lot about the fundamentals of Factions. After much deliberation, we have decided to revamp the Factions narrative universe to increase its dynamic flexibility and disrupt the concept-space within which we iterate our ongoing creative development model.

body:
We at Factions have decided to take a page from Riot's Narrative team and revamp our storyverse to eliminate some clunky old constraints that were preventing us from telling exciting stories.

Link: **[April 1 Dev Blog: Exploring the World of Factions](http://leaguefactions.net/2015/04/01/april-1-dev-blog-exploring-the-world-of-factions/)**

We're really excited to be taking this long overdue step to improve Factions by removing factions.

replies.body:
This is the actual best thing that's ever happened in the history of Factions and I am loving every minute.

I am so excited I could go on a quest for vengeance!!!
